title: The Pogmentary: Born Ready
overview: Paul Pogba is a sports star, a world soccer champion, an iconic Manchester United player with an uncommon personality both on and off the field. But he is coming to a turning point in his life. He dreams of helping his country win a new title, but he is going to have to decide whether or not to stay on with Manchester. A decision that will affect both the future of his career and his family life.
